channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2023081290
item.description:
Report X-2023081290

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-16
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON A CART IN THE QA AREA. DescribePack: THE LEAKAGE TOOK PLACE ON BOTH SIDES OF THE PACKAGE. THE CORROSION COMPLETELY DESTROYED THE ENTIRE BOX. THE LEAKAGE WAS ABSORBED THROUGHOUT THE CARDBOARD BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY HANDLED USING THE CORRECT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS NEEDED AT THE TIME.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON A CART IN THE QA AREA. THE LEAKAGE TOOK PLACE ON ONE SIDE OF THE PACKAGE. DescribePack: THE SIDE OF THE PACKAGE WAS COMPLETELY DESTROYED FROM THE LEAKING HAZMAT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY HANDLED USING THE CORRECT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS NEEDED.

item.title: Report X-2023081244
item.description:
Report X-2023081244

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-16
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN THE QA AREA ON A CART LEAKING FROM THE SIDES. DescribePack: THE LEAKAGE TOOK PLACE AT THE TOP, SIDES, AND BOTTOM. THE BOX WAS STUCK TOGETHER FROM THE INSIDE. THE LEAKAGE WAS ABSORBED THROUGHOUT THE CARDBOARD BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY HANDLED USING THE CORRECT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS.
